name: LILAC 3 in 1 / LILAC
description: Due to numerous requests to improve and update the model. 1. 3 lilac, 3 vase, 2 colors - one archive. 2. Materials CORONA + VRAY 3. Reduced the number of polygons. Viewport is very fast! 4. Ultra Hi-res texture BUMP for vases. 5. Version 3dsmax 2011 -> to switch to the white stuff to choose any flower and include the modifier "WHITE FLOWER"
short_description:
Platform:	 3dsMax 2011 + fbx
Render:	 Vray
Size:	 85 MB
Style:	 Ethnic
Materials:	 Glass, Organics
